text: Hotel Carlton is a boutique hotel in Nob Hill which has been operating since 1927. It is operated by Joie de Vivre Hospitality. It is a contributing property to the Lower Nob Hill Apartment Hotel District, which was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1991. It is particularly known for the significant ownership interest which, as of 2015, California Senator Dianne Feinstein and husband Richard C. Blum hold in it. == References == Category:Hotels in San Francisco Category:Historic district contributing properties in California
title: Hotel Carlton
